description: S3 bucket ops, sizes, trends, etc. and overall Ceph activity.

panels.description: Per minute instead of per second.
panels.title: COPY Operations per S3 Bucket (ops/min)

panels.description: Actual (raw - thats how much data is generated) and Replicated (thats how much storage is needed for it).
panels.title: S3 Storage Usage

panels.description: The number of objects within S3 buckets, multiply by 1000 to get exact value.
panels.title: S3 Objects (Thousands)

panels.description: 11 - default shards. We recomed for 100k objects per 1 shard for best S3 performance.
panels.title: S3 Bucket Shards

targets.expr:
(increase(ceph_rgw_lc_expire_current{job="$job"}[1m])
  * on(instance_id) group_left(ceph_daemon) label_join(ceph_rgw_metadata{job="$job"}, "ceph_daemon", "", "ceph_daemon"))+
(increase(ceph_rgw_lc_abort_mpu{job="$job"}[1m])
  * on(instance_id) group_left(ceph_daemon) label_join(ceph_rgw_metadata{job="$job"}, "ceph_daemon", "", "ceph_daemon"))

(sum(ceph_pg_scrubbing{pool_id="30"}) by (pg))+(sum(ceph_pg_deep{pool_id="30"}) by (pg))+(sum(ceph_pg_scrubbing{pool_id="35"}) by (pg))+(sum(ceph_pg_deep{pool_id="35"}) by (pg))+(sum(ceph_pg_scrubbing{pool_id="31"}) by (pg))+(sum(ceph_pg_deep{pool_id="31"}) by (pg))

(sum(ceph_pg_backfilling{pool_id="30"}) by (pg))+(sum(ceph_pg_backfilling{pool_id="31"}) by (pg))+(sum(ceph_pg_backfilling{pool_id="32"}) by (pg))+(sum(ceph_pg_backfilling{pool_id="33"}) by (pg))+(sum(ceph_pg_backfilling{pool_id="34"}) by (pg))+(sum(ceph_pg_backfilling{pool_id="35"}) by (pg))

panels.description: A counter to see which disks have been used the most
panels.title: Total Ops History per OSD

list.description: Replication factor for RGW data pool
list.label: replication
list.name: replication

title: Ceph - S3 Bucket Metrics
